playn.core

Interface ImageLayer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Layer, Layer.HasSize
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ImageLayerCanvas, ImageLayerGL

    public interface ImageLayer
extends Layer.HasSize
    A layer that displays a bitmapped image. By default, the layer is the same size as its underlying image, but its size can be changed from that default and the layer will either scale or repeat the image to cause it to fill its bounds. See setSize(float, float), Image.setRepeat(boolean, boolean), etc.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface playn.core.Layer

        Layer.HasSize, Layer.HitTester, Layer.Util

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clearHeight()
      Clears out the configured height for this layer, causing it to return to using the height of its contained image.
      void clearWidth()
      Clears out the configured width for this layer, causing it to return to using the height of its contained image.
      Image image()
      Returns the image contained by this layer.
      void setHeight(float height)
      Configures the height of this layer.
      ImageLayer setImage(Image image)
      Sets the image contained by this layer.
      void setSize(float width, float height)
      Configures the size of this layer.
      void setWidth(float width)
      Configures the width of this layer.

    • Method Detail

      • image

        Image image()
        Returns the image contained by this layer.

      • setImage

        ImageLayer setImage(Image image)
        Sets the image contained by this layer.

      • setSize

        void setSize(float width,
           float height)
        Configures the size of this layer. The size defaults to the size of the image contained by the layer, but if it is set manually then the image will be scaled or repeated to fill the specified size.

      • setWidth

        void setWidth(float width)
        Configures the width of this layer. See setSize(float, float).

      • setHeight

        void setHeight(float height)
        Configures the height of this layer. See setSize(float, float).

      • clearWidth

        void clearWidth()
        Clears out the configured width for this layer, causing it to return to using the height of its contained image.

      • clearHeight

        void clearHeight()
        Clears out the configured height for this layer, causing it to return to using the height of its contained image.
